items.title: United Nations Security Council meeting on Gaza highlights growing isolation of U.S. on West Asia conflict
items.summary: The Security Council meeting once again reflected the deep isolation that Israel and its closest ally, the United States, face when it comes to growing international demands for accountability and an end to Israel’s war in Gaza

items.title: IPR Gandhinagar team proposes roadmap for India’s fusion power plans
items.summary: Controlled fusion can only happen in extreme conditions, the kinds that exist inside stars. There are currently two popular ways to achieve this: inertial confinement and magnetic confinement. India is already invested in the magnetic confinement technique as a member of the ITER project, which is b

items.summary: A proposal has been sent to the Railway Board for construction of a subway under the Umbrella Work scheme, a senior official of Chennai division of Southern Railway said; it is also taking steps to provide seating arrangements on all platforms at the Thiruninravur station under prescribed norms

items.title: China penalises ByteDance and Alibaba platforms in content crackdown
